    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_EPSILON

        public static final double DEFAULT_EPSILON
        Stores the default epsilon. The default epsilon is 10^-9.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • createFPNPairs

        public static final List<FPNPair> createFPNPairs(double[] xValues,
                                                 double[] yValues)
        Creates list of FPN number from the given x-values and y-values.
        Parameters:
        xValues -
        yValues -
        Returns:
        a newly created list of FPN-pairs created from the given x-values and y-values
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if not as many x-values are given as y-values
